statement.title: 题目描述
statement.content:
Blockchain technology is used in many digital currency systems, such as Bitcoin and Ethereum. In this technology, distributed users share a common list of records (called the chain), and a user has the right to add a new record to the chain by solving a mathematical problem. This process is called mining. The i-Taiwan company has developed up a new digital currency system, called the ICPC (I-taiwan Coins for the Public Currency). In the ICPC system, its mathematical problem for mining is as follows. Given positive integer $n$, the problem asks one to find the largest integer a such that

$$
\frac{1}{n} = \frac{1}{a \oplus b} + \frac{1}{b}
$$

, for some positive integer $b$ where $\oplus$ is the bitwise exclusive-or operator. For example, for $n = 12$, its solution is $a = 145$. In this case, $b = 13$ and thus $a \oplus b = 145 \oplus 13 = 100100012 \oplus 11012 = 100111002 = 156$.
Accordingly,

$$
\frac{1}{a \oplus b} + \frac{1}{b} = \frac{1}{156} + \frac{1}{13} = \frac{1}{12} = \frac{1}{n}
$$

You are an ambitious programmer, and you want to mine a lot of digital coins from this system in a short time. Please write a program to find the largest a for each n in order to earn the rewards from ICPC.

statement.title: 输入格式
statement.content: The first line of the input file contains exactly one positive integer $T$ that gives you the number of test cases. In the following $T$ lines, each line corresponds to one test case and specifies the integer $n$.

statement.title: 输出格式
statement.content: For each test case, output the largest number $a$ in one line.

statement.title: 样例
statement.content:
#### Sample Input 1

```plain
3
6
7
10
```

#### Sample Output 1

```plain
45
48
101
```

#### Sample Input 2

```plain
3
1
2
7777777
```

#### Sample Output 2

```plain
0
5
60493819864864
```
